title: Canada’s Trudeau Revokes Use of Emergency Powers
sub_head: Amid mounting pressure, the prime minister said the country no longer needs the special powers he invoked to handle protests against Covid-19 mandates
body:
OTTAWA—In a surprise turnaround, Canadian Prime Minister Justin Trudeau on Wednesday said his government no longer required emergency powers to deal with protests against Covid-19 restrictions, amid mounting criticism from civil-liberties groups and some Canadian politicians that the use of those measures was an abuse of state power.
In a press briefing here Wednesday, Mr. Trudeau said police had been successful in shutting down a protracted protest in the capital and that law-enforcement officials had assured him officers had the tools to maintain public safety without extraordinary measures.
